questions[0][text].example: What is the capital of France?

body.description: The message to be sent. Maximum of 10,000 characters.

time.description: Time associated with the lesson in HH:MM:SS format

files[].description: Array of files associated with the lesson

UpdateOptionRequest.title: UpdateOptionRequest
UpdateOptionRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing option

name.description: The text or label of the option

is_true.description: Indicates whether this option is the correct answer

text.example: What is the capital of France?

note.example: This question is related to geography.

text.description: The text content of the question.

update_options.description: Array of options for the question.

name.description: The text content of the option.

is_true.description: Indicates if the option is correct.

governorate_id.description: The ID of the governorate. Must exist in the governorate table and not be soft deleted.

city_id.description: The ID of the city. Must exist in the city table and not be soft deleted.

role.description: The role of the recipient (e.g., student or admin). Defaults to 'student' if not provided.

phone_type.description: The type of phone to use (e.g., phone_number or family_phone_number).

message.description: The message to be sent. Maximum of 10,000 characters.

purchase_code.description: The purchase code for the course

lesson_id.description: The ID of the lesson. Required if section_id is present.

section_id.description: The ID of the section. Required either on its own or along with lesson_id.

option_id.description: The ID of the selected option.

image.description: The image file of the student

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the book was soft deleted
